function ERI_EP05_17()
    --.結-2【3月第1週】「姫選挙-戦姫ｖｓ姫皇-」
    SaveData.Title = "姫選挙-戦姫ｖｓ姫皇-"

    --//BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024cd")
    --//BU：エルメス（笑顔・ラスボス）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM13.wav",1500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0353.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Ladies & Gentlegaaaaarls<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Weeds! Guests evvvvveryone<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0354.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Now, now, now! It's time for the one big event of the year that decides the top of Yuriai Private Academy—the Princess Election!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0355.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Competing for the princess throne today are me, the current princess, Hermes Himegami! And Erika-chan, the Battle Princess who has beaten every 'Princess' other than me in the Princess Elections!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0356.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "When there are two beautiful girls, competing over who's cuter is fate! Destiny! <sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0357.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "So! Tell us who you think is cuter, okay~~~~~ <sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    --//SE：歓声（MAX)
PLAY_SE("SEf001.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --//CG：ステージ上のエリカ（対・エルメス）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVa001ai")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_ERU03ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    STOP_SE("SEf001.wav",1000)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0358.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Okay then, let me explain the rules for this Princess Election<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0359.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "The theme for appeal is 'Freedom'! From now, Erika-chan and I will take turns showing our free-form appeals<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0360.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Everyone in the audience will watch and vote for the one you support using the tablet in front of you<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_ERU03ib")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 600, -185, 80, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0361.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "By the way, the tablets for the guests were provided by one of the directors, the president of Houou Electric, Miss <r=ほうおういん>Hououin</r><r=いかづち> Isoto</r>! Thanks, Zucchi! <sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_ERU03ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0362.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "And then, after ten minutes of appeals each, the one with the most votes wins! Now, let's open the current voting rates!!!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024cd")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//CI：得票率 エルメス60：エリカ40 111
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI111a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ I have forty percent, and Hermes has sixty. Not as bad as I thought. ]])

    MSG([[ There's a high chance the off-campus guest voters, who are basically plants, haven't acted yet, but tying with Hermes at first impression should work in my favor. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1302.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (The question is whether to appeal first or not) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1303.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (My impression will probably be weaker after Hermes' intense appeal, but if I appeal first and don't get votes, it's over immediately) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1304.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (I wonder what Hermes is thinking?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-800,200)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_ERU03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0363.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Fidgety... fidgety..." ]])

    MSG([[ She’s visibly restless. ]])

    MSG([[ Surely not thinking at all. Just a face that wants to make the audience happy as soon as possible. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_ERU03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0364.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Sorry, Erika-chan! I just can’t hold back anymore, so I’m gonna start my appeal!!!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024cd")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0365.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "The theme is exactly 'Cute'! I’ll use the full ten minutes to sing and dance and make everyone happyーーーーーーーーー<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    --//SE：黄色い声援
PLAY_SE("SEf007.wav",0,true)

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Hermes started the live with her usual, no, even higher than usual, energy. ]])

    MSG([[ Roaring cheers like an explosion. The audience going wild. Hermes' vote percentage skyrocketing in real time. ]])

    MSG([[ There’s no need to explain in detail anymore. ]])

    MSG([[ Like the cute image evoked by the words 'beautiful girl' and 'idol' taking tangible form, Hermes sings, dances, and graces the stage with smiles. ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing that flawless smile, I, her competitor, couldn’t help but smile too. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0366.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I’m not stopping yet today! I’ll boost the mood with a medley of my signature songs!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0367.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Get ready to see if your favorite songs are included! Then, music<sprite="Emoji" name="star">startaaaaaaar<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    --//SE：黄色い声援
--PLAY_SE("SEf007.wav")

    MSG([[ Even though I’ve seen this dance many times, I can’t take my eyes off it. ]])

    MSG([[ Every gesture, every expression, every note is more polished each time I watch, and it makes my heart race. ]])

    MSG([[ Even at the pinnacle, Hermes’ cuteness keeps growing. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    STOP_SE("SEf007.wav",1000)
STOP_BGM(1500)

    --//BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 0,true)

    --//BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Suddenly, the stage lights went out. ]])

    --//BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024cd")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ The lighting returned almost immediately, but Hermes was nowhere to be seen. The audience began murmuring in confusion. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "H-Huh? Hermes-chan?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "Hermes-chaaaaan!!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "Where did Hermes-chan go!? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0368.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Hehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Surprised? I’m here insteadーーーーーー<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    MSG([[ The audience ruckus was brief before hearing Hermes’ voice from the back. ]])

    MSG([[ And the next moment— ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM17.wav")

    --//CG：姫神エルメス登場（屋内）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV006aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0369.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Come on, everyone, laugh and smile! Cute begins with a smile! Cute is justice! Not cute is a no-no～～～～<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    MSG([[ Just like at the entrance ceremony, a stunt. From the second floor seats down toward the stage, Hermes floats down like an angel in a suddenly changed uniform. ]])

    MSG([[ The noisy venue quieted to watch as Hermes gracefully landed. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1305.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "So this is... the peak of Yuriai Private Academy." ]])

    MSG([[ Not just ordinary appeals. Both the appeal and costume constantly change and evolve. ]])

    MSG([[ It expresses cuteness with such radiant brilliance it almost hurts to look at—surpassing the audience’s imagination. ]])

    MSG([[ The Himegami family’s sneaky schemes mean nothing here. If cuteness were purely a competition, no way I’d be even close to Hermes. ]])

    MSG([[ Once again, I was reminded that Hermes is truly the ultimate 'beautiful girl.' ]])

    --//BG：ステージの上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024cd")
    --//BU：エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0370.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "That was so much fun~~~~~~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Singing before so many people in a long time really got me pumped up~~~~~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0371.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Hehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Now I’ll hand over to Erika-chan! I’m suuuper excited for Erika-chan’s appeal too~~~~~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

    --//BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --//CI：得票率 エルメス95：エリカ05 112
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI112a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM13.wav",1500,true)

    MSG([[ As Hermes moved to the side of the stage, the vote ratios shifted. ]])

    MSG([[ Despite the disastrous numbers displayed, no confused voices arose in the venue. ]])

    MSG([[ After witnessing Hermes’ appeal, everyone understood the result. ]])

    MSG([[ I almost laughed at the unbelievable adversity. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1306.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If it were my old self, I probably would have panicked." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1307.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "But now, I’m okay. Because everyone is with me." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//CG：ステージ上のエリカ（決意）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVa001ai")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I stood center stage but couldn’t see the audience’s reaction. They seemed tired from Hermes’ appeal and showed a kind of 'not interested' vibe. ]])

    MSG([[ So, following the original plan, I decided to drop the bomb. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1308.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Before my appeal, there’s something I need to say to everyone." ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes is the ultimate 'beautiful girl.' Even if I challenge her as just a 'beautiful girl,' I stand no chance. ]])

    MSG([[ I must fight with my absolute individuality that only I possess. ]])

    MSG([[ That individuality is— ]])

PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav",500,true)
    --//特殊選択肢
    -- 　⇒【女装男子】

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP05_1_ERIKA,"この学園でボクだけが持つ特徴は？")

STOP_SE("SEf002.wav")

    if result == false then
        NazenanoBokuhime("EP_BAD_07", "ERI_EP05_17")
        return
    end
    --//BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 0,true)

    MSG([[ “As planned,” the lights dropped. In the pitch black, I quickly prepared. ]])

    MSG([[ When the lights came back on after more than ten seconds— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)

    --//CG：ボク姫様と乙女主義（ミナト単体）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV026aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0925.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "My gender is male. I have been disguising myself as my cousin 'Erika' to attend the academy up until now." ]])
    --//SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav",0,true)

    MSG([[ The audience finally reacted. But their reaction was obviously confused and hardly favorable. ]])

    MSG([[ Since this is a contest about 'cuteness,' suddenly declaring 'I am a man' naturally causes that reaction. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "We didn’t come to see a guy!? Get lostーーーー!!!!" ]])

    MSG([[ The crowd’s heckling voice echoed the majority’s sentiment. ]])

    MSG([[ But I did not flinch. I was prepared for all the catcalls and insults. I had no other appeal left. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0926.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "The theme of the appeal I’m about to show is ‘Bokuhime PROJECT.’" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0927.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Why I decided to become a ‘princess,’ and how I became one—I'll show it all." ]])

    MSG([[ Yes. If I can stir your hearts, it will be through the crossdressing I’ve built up over the years. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "Hey! Get that guy off the stage already!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "Bring Hermes-chan back, damn it!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "There’s no way we’re voting for a guy!" ]])

    STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",500)
    --//CG：ボク姫様と乙女主義（ミナト・リラ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV026ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0589.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Just watch quietly, you weeds!" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira stood next to me and scolded the audience. Her charisma quieted the heckling instantly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0590.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Come on, Erika. First, explain why you started crossdressing." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0591.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Not just some pervert, but a crossdressing guy with conviction, right?<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1309.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes…!" ]])

    MSG([[ With Lira’s encouragement, I began speaking to the audience. ]])

    MSG([[ The reason I started crossdressing—the beginning of ‘Bokuhime PROJECT.’ ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1310.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I have only one older sister. While she was enrolled here at Yuriai Private Academy, she was caught up in some incident and fell unconscious." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1311.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "She still hasn’t woken up... To find a clue to awaken her, I started undercover as ‘Erika.’" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1312.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I believed that by becoming a 'Princess,' a position with access to many secrets of Yuriai Academy, I might find that clue." ]])
    --//SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav",0,true)

    MSG([[ The audience began murmuring again. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s the first time I’ve publicly shared this secret. Of course, the guests from outside and many students were surprised. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    --//SE：拍子（ﾊﾟﾝﾊﾟﾝｯ）
    STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)
PLAY_SE("SEa018.wav")
WAIT(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0592.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Alright! Attention everyone!" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira clapped her hands to drown out the murmurs. ]])

    MSG([[ Confirming all eyes were on her, Lira spoke crisply to the audience. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0593.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Honestly, who cares about this guy’s backstory, right? What matters is whether this crossdressing guy Erika here is cute." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0594.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "So I’m gonna make you all think he’s cute<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Watch closely and see if you don’t totally fall for this guy!" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira grabbed her makeup kit and grinned. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0595.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Minato-kun, remember the techniques my sister Riko taught you?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0928.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yes, of course." ]])
    --//CG：コスプレ店員エリカ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV013aa")
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    --//effect：セピア加工

    MSG([[ During cosplay training, I had a chance reunion with Riko. The makeup techniques she taught me have greatly helped my crossdressing so far. ]])

    MSG([[ Yes, what I learned back then was— ]])

PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav",500,true)
    --//特殊選択肢⇒【メイク技術】

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP05_2_ERIKA,"リコさんから学んだ女装の技術は？")

STOP_SE("SEf002.wav")

    if result == false then
        NazenanoBokuhime("EP_BAD_07", "ERI_EP05_17")
        return
    end

    --//CG：ボク姫様と乙女主義（ミナト・リラ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV026ab")
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0929.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Without the makeup skills Riko-san taught me, I wouldn’t be standing on this stage now." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0930.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "To become cute, you need proper technique." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0596.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Exactly<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> And vice versa, with the right technique, even a plain-faced girl or a guy like you can become truly cute." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0597.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Now, I’ll teach you! Anyone, even a guy, has the right to become cute!" ]])
    --//CG：ボク姫様と乙女主義（エリカ・リラ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV026ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//SE：黄色い悲鳴
PLAY_SE("SEf008.wav",0,true)

    MSG([[ In just a few tens of seconds, Lira and I quickly transformed back to the original 'Erika' makeup. ]])

    MSG([[ This speed of makeup standing up—amazing, as expected of a charismatic JK. ]])

    MSG([[ Watching me transform into a girly appearance right before their eyes caused waves of unsettlement among the audience. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0010.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "Was that kid really a guy!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "At this point, it’s fine if he’s a guy!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0012.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "Truly, that’s absolutely right!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0013.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "Calm down!!! No matter the makeup, a guy’s a guy!" ]])

    MSG([[ Thanks to supportive upperclassmen mixed in, the atmosphere grew even more unsettled. ]])

    MSG([[ This is a good flow. So far, everything is unfolding perfectly. ]])

    STOP_SE("SEf008.wav",1000)
    --//CG：ボク姫様と乙女主義（ウラン・エリカ・リラ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV026ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0386.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I understand that everyone is confused—it’s only natural." ]])

    MSG([[ Then Uran stood next to me, speaking to the audience in place of Lira. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0387.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I disliked men. I detested men setting foot in Yuriai Academy and strongly opposed coeducation." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0388.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "But meeting Erika, who has both male and female sides, changed me." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0389.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
